data.text: @RevJodyStowell Try a lesser pickle and work your way back to Branstons. You might need to build back up your taste buds.
@RevJodyStowell My 16-year-old granddaughter is really struggling with food as most things are still tasting awful several months post Covid.
@RevJodyStowell Glad itâ€™s not just me, I have drunk black coffee everyday since I was 14, now 57, post Covid not enjoying it at all 🤔
@RevJodyStowell Branston is awful at the best of times.  Maybe try some really good home-made chutney - available at all church fetes.
@RevJodyStowell I had the same symptom. Fortunately it has improved and it's now back to normal - hopefully same for you 😊
@RevJodyStowell I rode on a bus on the M40 in 1982 and realised (a) that I was ill, and (b) that the cheese & pickle sandwich I was eating was utterly vile. Never been able to eat it since.
@RevJodyStowell It was the only thing I could taste during covid - so I used it as dip with the crunchiest crisps I could find !
@RevJodyStowell This is a horrific post that should come with a trigger warning. I am sorry to read this. I hope other symptoms aren't impacting you as much.
